end_sources()
#END-FILE-LIST

get_source_group(yasli_sources "PropertyTree\\\\QPropertyTree (yasli)")
EXCLUDE_FILE_FROM_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER(${yasli_sources})
set_property(SOURCE ${yasli_sources} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_FLAGS " /wd4996")

CryEngineModule(EditorCommon EDITOR_COMPILE_SETTINGS PCH "stdafx.cpp" SOLUTION_FOLDER "Sandbox")

target_compile_definitions(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE
	-DEDITOR_COMMON_EXPORTS 
	-DNOT_USE_CRY_MEMORY_MANAGER
)

set(MFC_VERSION 140)
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE mfcs${MFC_VERSION}$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:d> zlib)

#TODO: remove dependencies from editor common to editor!
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/Sandbox/EditorQt")	
target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/Sandbox/EditorQt/Include")

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRY_EXTENSIONS_DIR}/CryLink/Interface")

target_include_directories(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE "${CRYENGINE_DIR}/Code/Sandbox/Libs/CryQt")
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} PRIVATE CryQt)
